snippet.title: Puzzling Places - Monthly Pack #1 DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing the Monthly Pack #1 - bringing you SIX new puzzles from all around the world for 4.99$! 

Available to purchase NOW in-app or through the Quest / PS VR stores! https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3931148300302917/

This DLC Puzzle Pack includes:
- Fire Station No. 38 (Baltimore, MD, USA )
- Argentière Glacier in 2012 (Mont-Blanc Massif, France)
- Blue Tiled Bench (Santarém, Portugal)
- Florence Cathedral Entrance (Florence, Italy)
- Old Wooden Sauna (Latvia)
- Ursus C360 Tractor (N/A)

Special thanks to Taylor Houlihan, pierre391, Shahriar Shahrabi, Viesturs Dille, and Carlos Faustino for providing photogrammetry scans. Detailed information about each puzzle: https://puzzlingplaces.ghost.io/m1/

---
Play Puzzling Places
Quest / Quest 2: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3931148300302917/
PlayStation VR: http://play.st/PuzzlingPlaces
---
Follow Puzzling Places
Discord - https://discord.gg/Ccas6uVPFS
Twitter - https://twitter.com/PuzzlingPlaces
Instagram - https://instagram.com/puzzlingplaces
